verses.verse: Then He cried<WH7121> out in my hearing<WH241> with a loud<WH1419> voice<WH6963> saying,<WH559> "Draw<WH7126> near,<WH7126> O executioners<WH6486> of the city,<WH5892> each<WH376> with his destroying<WH4892> weapon<WH3627> in his hand.<WH3027>"

And behold,<WH2009> six<WH8337> men<WH376> came<WH935> from the direction<WH1870> of the upper<WH5945> gate<WH8179> which<WH834> faces<WH6437> north,<WH6828> each<WH376> with his shattering<WH4660> weapon<WH3627> in his hand;<WH3027> and among<WH8432> them was a certain<WH259> man<WH376> clothed<WH3847> in linen<WH906> with a writing<WH9373> case<WH7083> at his loins.<WH4975> And they went<WH935> in and stood<WH5975> beside<WH681> the bronze<WH5178> altar.<WH4196>

Then the glory<WH9202> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> went<WH5927> up from the cherub<WH3742> on which<WH834> it had been,<WH1961> to the threshold<WH4670> of the temple.<WH1004> And He called<WH7121> to the man<WH376> clothed<WH3847> in linen<WH906> at whose<WH834> loins<WH4975> was the writing<WH9373> case.<WH7083>

And the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to him, "Go<WH5674> through the midst<WH8432> of the city,<WH5892> [even] through the midst<WH8432> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> and put<WH8427> a mark<WH8420> on the foreheads<WH4696> of the men<WH376> who sigh<WH584> and groan<WH602> over<WH5921> all<WH3605> the abominations<WH8441> which are being committed<WH6213> in its midst.<WH8432>"

But to the others<WH428> He said<WH559> in my hearing,<WH241> "Go<WH5674> through the city<WH5892> after<WH310> him and strike;<WH5221> do not let your eye<WH5869> have<WH2347> pity,<WH2347> and do not spare.<WH2550>

"Utterly<WH4889> slay<WH2026> old<WH2205> men,<WH2205> young<WH970> men,<WH970> maidens,<WH1330> little<WH2945> children,<WH2945> and women,<WH802> but do not touch<WH5066> any<WH3605> man<WH376> on whom<WH834> is the mark;<WH8420> and you shall start<WH2490> from My sanctuary.<WH4720>" So they started<WH2490> with the elders<WH2205> who<WH834> [were] before<WH6440> the temple.<WH1004>

And He said<WH559> to them, "Defile<WH2930> the temple<WH1004> and fill<WH4390> the courts<WH2691> with the slain.<WH2491> Go<WH3318> out!" Thus they went<WH3318> out and struck<WH5221> down<WH5221> [the people] in the city.<WH5892>

Then it came<WH1961> about as they were striking<WH5221> and I [alone] was left,<WH7604> that I fell<WH5307> on my face<WH6440> and cried<WH2199> out saying,<WH559> "Alas,<WH162> Lord<WH136> God!<WH3068> Art Thou destroying<WH7843> the whole<WH3605> remnant<WH7611> of Israel<WH3478> by pouring<WH8210> out Thy wrath<WH2534> on Jerusalem<WH3389>?"

Then He said<WH559> to me, "The iniquity<WH5771> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> and Judah<WH3063> is very,<WH3966> very<WH3966> great,<WH1419> and the land<WH776> is filled<WH4390> with blood,<WH1818> and the city<WH5892> is full<WH4390> of perversion;<WH4297> for they say,<WH559> 'The Lord<WH3068> has forsaken<WH5800> the land,<WH776> and the Lord<WH3068> does not see!<WH7200>'
"But as for Me, My eye<WH5869> will have<WH2347> no<WH3808> pity<WH2347> nor<WH3808> shall I spare,<WH2550> but I shall bring<WH5414> their conduct<WH1870> upon their heads.<WH7218>"

Then behold,<WH2009> the man<WH376> clothed<WH3847> in linen<WH906> at whose<WH834> loins<WH4975> was the writing<WH7083> case<WH7083> reported,<WH7725> <WH1697> saying,<WH559> "I have done<WH6213> just<WH9201> as Thou hast commanded<WH6680> me."
